thread.section_title: School Stream - School Communication App Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of School Stream - School Communication App | schoolstream.com.au
thread.title: Sylvia
thread.title_full: School Stream - School Communication App reviewed by Sylvia

author: Sylvia
title: Sylvia
text: After using School Stream for a few years now, we have found it an intregal and valuable resource for all types of parent and secondary student communication. There are so many aspects of a school and siutations arise at short notice. The app and our accompanying website give us the flexibilty and ability to get the messages we need to deliver out there quickly, accurately and with minimal cost. It's also a great way to build a community, be a resource for students and deliver fun messages without having to wait for the next newsletter.
